wikipedia_page.main: Ernest George Perry (25 April 1910 – 28 December 1998) was a British Labour Party politician.

response: At the 1951 general election he was elected Member of Parliament for the marginal Battersea South constituency, gaining the seat from Labour incumbent Caroline Ganley.  Partridge held the seat until the 1964 general election, when it was gained by Labour candidate Ernest Perry.
